text: وَلَهُ ٱلۡكِبۡرِيَآءُ فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۖ وَهُوَ ٱلۡعَزِيزُ ٱلۡحَكِيمُ

translation.en: And to Him belongs [all] grandeur within the heavens and the earth, and He is the Exalted in Might, the Wise
translation.id: Dan hanya bagi-Nya segala keagungan di langit dan di bumi, dan Dialah Yang Mahaperkasa, Mahabijaksana
